name: Bowtest
description:
Simple test to create a bow that shoots arrows with variable force.

Goals:

  • Enable two options of play, either using the mouse or the arrow keys to determine the angle of the bow (press 1 to enable arrow keys, press 2 to enable mouse controls (arrow keys by default)).
  • Have the arrows simulate the trajectory of an actual arcing arrow by simulating gravity. Additionally, have the angle of the arrow reflect the current trajectory.
  • Have a way of firing the arrows, with a meter to indicate the force at which the arrow will be fired (press and hold Space).
  • Have the arrows react to obstructions, ceasing movement and becoming embedded in the obstruction.
